alert.note: Alert for Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 03 at 11:41AM MDT until November 04 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY HAS BEEN ISSUED FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Teller County and Pikes Peak * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 6 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized heavier snowfall could result in lowered visibility and hazardous travel.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft
